website_summaries.verdict: The Ear Force P21 headset may not support surround sound, but it is a solid PlayStation 3 accessory that supports in-game chat.
pros: also works as a PC/Mac headset

customer_reviews.title: Best Headset under $45.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! I love This headset. I use them on a PS4, and the reason that my $160.00 TurtleBeaches are now sitting and collecting dust is because THIS PS3 headsets MIC IS AMAZING. You will always have a better mic when it had a usb power source because the mic has a stronger power source than those with just a 3.5 mil audio jack. If you want your friends to be blown away by the high quality of your voice, buy this headset. After sharing this with my gaming friends, 6 of them bought this headset. I will buy again when my headset breaks. This is my second pair, and my first lasted 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Ken S.

customer_reviews.title: Buggy and a Real Pain to Use and Never Worked on PS3
customer_reviews.text: Extremely dissapointed with this product. We've only used these headphones on the PC since buying them earlier this year. We have never been able to get them to work on our PS3, even after countless hours of troubleshooting procedures from many different sources, including Turtle Beach. The cords are a huge pain to deal with, frequently get tangled and are always in the way. We finally got so fed up with the PX21 that we went to the local Gamestop, bought a bluetooth ear piece for $35 and never looked back. The bluetooth ear piece has been flawless. I can't believe we paid so much and wasted so much time for such troublesome product like the PX21.
customer_reviews.author: RM44G

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely amazing headset. The sound output is clear and strong, to the point where you can use them as speakers (not super loud speakers, but still) and the mic input is crisp and clear. It's very comfortable to wear, although somewhat loose on my smaller-that-average head. If you are into or even plan to get into online gaming, this headset is a MUST buy at the just under 50$ price. This headset is also universal, which means it can be used with all consoles and even PCs. EDIT: The price has hiked significantly since I bought them. Get them while they're cheap, you wont regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Jhon dafish

customer_reviews.title: Functions great, build quality so so
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the PX21 headset with the optional digital signal processor about 10 months ago. The audio and mic work great and the audio adjustment controls are convenient and easy to use. The headset is lightweight and so doesn't bother you while wearing it for a marathon gaming session. However, because it is lightweight, it isn't the sturdiest headset I've owned. I recently dropped mine (off of a tall bookshelf mind you) and the plastic connection between the earpiece and the part that goes over your head broke (turtle beach has replacements for some parts, but not this one). That said, I liked it enough that I ordered a replacement PX21 the same day.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 8 months
customer_reviews.text: Used these headphones for 8 months before I started getting fluctuations in the volume level. The problem was where the wire from the headphones went into the control module. I returend them as there were within the warranty period and Turtle Beach replaced them promptly. I believe the failure was due to packaging design as it put undo pressure on the failure point, needless to say the new packaging has changed for the better and the problem has been addressed. If this new set fails or works out I'll let you know either way in the future. I would give this item 5 stars if it wasn't for the failure.
customer_reviews.author: S&M Fournier

customer_reviews.title: Item is not worth the cost due to high damage rate over a one year period. Lower durability compared to the competition.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several of these items a few years back in order to use them for gaming but their durability over the long run is lacking therefore I cannot recommend them nor their updated models until Turtle Beach can adequately fix the quality of the item in the long run. The items tend to break too often just above the earphone cups by simply dropping them off the table or chair and the wiring will have a much higher damage rate compared to the competition since by my experience three of the headphones of this same model broke over a one year period. I eventually gave up buying anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Ferdinand Turla

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic and broke in a few months
customer_reviews.text: Shoddy Workmanship and low durability. The headset is good with sound quality but the quality of the headset itself can only be described as worst then cheap. For a 60 bucks you should be getting a better headset then this but mine broke two weeks after I bought it. The hinges cracked after a few uses and I had to use plastic glue to get it back so I can use it cause I need it. Turtle beach are using cheap plastic to steal our money and we are letting them get away with it.
customer_reviews.author: Valued customer

customer_reviews.title: I got the wrong headset.
customer_reviews.text: I expected to get the PX21 for the Xbox 360/PS3/PC however I got the P21 which is for the PS3/PC this is a huge inconvenience including the inconvenience of having to wait 2 weeks for a delivery, while the delivery was free and the product came to me in MINT condition they sold a product which is not the correct product under false advertising. IF you want to buy from this company be sure you CONTACT them first, otherwise you will be getting ripped off. This was hardly worth my time and money and surely not worth the stress of having to wait even longer for the right product.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Ear Force PX21 Gaming Headset for Playstation 3
customer_reviews.text: I got everything promised, the manufacturer overestimates the comfort for longterm use, I find that after 2.5 hrs of use they tend to cause some discomfort due to the pressure. The sound quality is exceptionally high and the game sounds never drown out the sound of game chat because you can adjust the volume of each independenly, in addition it has chat boost a feature which increases the volume of chat when somebody speaks. The headphones are durable, I have dropped them several times with no ill effects. Larger cups for the ears may be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl

customer_reviews.title: PX21 is alright.
customer_reviews.text: The PX21 Ear Force headset is alright, I like it. Sound on the headset is OK, not really what it is all hyped up to be. While playing FPS video games I can hear people walking around, but is still a little hard to tell where it comes from 'cause of sounds only coming from left and right sides. There is a slight "buzz" in the headphones, but really can't hear it unless the sounds is low, but still is hard to notice. Everything is fine, I just believe the product is really over priced, then again, that is the value of our dollar at work XD.
customer_reviews.author: Phill

customer_reviews.title: Tried to super glue the piece back together
customer_reviews.text: Product broke 4 days after the expiration of the warranty. Earphone sheared off the headset. Tried to super glue the piece back together, but the break was impossible to repair. Product is defective. Worse, when I complained the seller never responding despite claiming a 1 business day response time. I would not purchase the brand, nor use the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Avery Abernethy

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without it now
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are a must have for any serious gamer, and I mean a must have. It's a necessity. This is such a great quality product. Lightweight but durable. Works well with my PS3. I destroy in Hardcore Search and Destroy with these things. I get about 10-15 kills average with these things on. You can hear everything with these on, and I mean everything. You hear people walking, setting up claymores, planting bombs, reloading, etc. Works better with Search and destory than team deathmatch because in td the sound and bass just go off the roof. Still, these things are beasty and really a necessity if you even consider yourself a gamer.
customer_reviews.author: Jay-aRe

customer_reviews.title: A very good starter set at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for quite some time now, and they have held up better than any other wired headset I have had. They don't feel like they will, and the creak when moved around. They are very comfortable for prolonged periods of play, and they sound great. I like the separate controls for chat and game volume the best. I do not feel that the surround reproduction is all that impressive but there is an improvement on locating things in game surroundings.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control Bad
customer_reviews.text: Seems like these either work or don't. I had them for about 3 months and then the left channel started going out. Sometimes I could disconnect them from the PS3 and reconnect they would start working. After about of month of this the left channel is completely gone. I've just stopped using them and wrote them off as a very bad purchase. I read the other reviews about this same problem and hoped I wouldn't get a lemon. Well lesson learned. The quality control of these is just bad. Take note, if they start going bad all hope is lost.
customer_reviews.author: Ed B

customer_reviews.title: Turtle beach fail, mic sounds like crap.
customer_reviews.text: These were ok, lasted about a year and then died, it was the in-line volume controller, i hate that feature because honestly it's what always seems to break first and ruin a headset. Otherwise good headset it probably would be going strong still if that didn't break. the mic was also crap, I moved on to a corsair headset but alas, the mic also sucks on this new headset. Both made me sound like I was in a helicopter talking over a radio. You can never win with headsets, my new one has no in-line volume control so i feel secure that it's not going to break from that, but it will probably break somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chat Hiss is awful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading the reviews but assumed that the hiss that was talked about was from audiophiles. WRONG! I plugged it in and had the chat sound all the way down. There was a barely audible sound that disappeared as soon as the game started playing. Great! Then I turned up the chat and realized that the hiss was horrible and went up directly in line with the level I turned up the chat. The result is a very disappointing headset. I only gave it two stars because of the excellent game sound.
customer_reviews.author: Matt and Anna

customer_reviews.title: they are very comfortable on the ears and the microphone is amazing
customer_reviews.text: My one complaint is that the cord is way too long. However, I know it was designed primarily for consoles other than PCs, which is what I use it for. That being said, they are very comfortable on the ears and the microphone is amazing. My old headset barely picked up any sound and these ones are so clear I end up needing to turn down the volume! Great headset for a great price
customer_reviews.author: Dyllan Rowan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty okay headset
customer_reviews.text: Okay here it goes I think for the price the px21 are a good buy. The sound is great for the money but not the best. I use them for call of duty and online gaming.The setup up was a little tricky but not hard at all. If you're looking to not spend a lot of money I recommend this product. Oh yeah the issue I have with these is that the padding tend to get my ears really warm which annoys me.
customer_reviews.author: William cunes

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones for my husband to use with his Playstation 3 game, Black Ops. He loves them. They give him surround sound that improves the quality of his game play. They also have great sound and are comfortable to wear, even over extended play time. There is a mute switch for the mic so that our home sounds are not heard by others. And when he is using the headset, he can mute the TV sound if the rest of the family does not want to hear him playing. It's great.
customer_reviews.author: M P

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT, but the hissing
customer_reviews.text: Seriously with the hissing. when i got it. i put them on and heard a loud hissing. i was willing to overlook this flaw and went to go play MW2 on my ps3 well, lets just say. THEY'RE AS CLOSE TO PERFECT AS PERFECT CAN BE you can hear everything clearly. especially footsteps when you're the last one alive in search and destroy. they work wonders, and i'm saying this from experience. Note- I got these yesterday and i already recommended them to soooo many people. they're great -PSN: jesse45
customer_reviews.author: FancyJesse

customer_reviews.title: Crunching sound in the left earphone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an early Christmas gift for my husband because he broke his old pair, his fault. He was happy because it was exactly the same kind he had before and I got them cheaper than he paid. The happiness lasted until he hooked them up. There was a weird crunching sound coming from the left earphone only. The right one was fine. I'm immediatly returning this. I read the reviews of other people but I thought it was an isolated problem because I also have a headset and have no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Blazing Fire

customer_reviews.title: I attempted to fix the plastic with tape and super glue but ultimately ended up purchasing another set of ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for several months and then eventually had a structural failure in the swivel part of the plastic that holds the right headphone to the headband part. I attempted to fix the plastic with tape and super glue but ultimately ended up purchasing another set of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan S

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my husband 18 months ago. He liked them, but the right ear piece just stopped working. They were never pulled on, dropped, ect. He was very careful with them because he knew I spend a lot (for a pair of headphones in my opinion) for them. I paid more than what they are being sold for now. I am really disappointed that they didn't last longer for that I paid for them. My Koss have lasted longer, and were cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Chappell

customer_reviews.title: Very nice unit
customer_reviews.text: Great unit. Easy setup. I would defiantly recommend these headphones...you can actually hear the small details you miss out on. You can hear enemies coming. This is worlds better than a bluetooth setup. Only downside is the corded setup and the length of cord from the headset to the controller could be longer...there is a clip that you can attach it to your shirt. Love that you can change game sound....chat sound...and all the other settings.
customer_reviews.author: dls322

customer_reviews.title: Great sound; great mike
customer_reviews.text: The P21 provides both great sound and a great mike in one headset. I got this headset so that game sounds would not permeate the house, and I'm pleased with the performance. I realized that the ability to distinguish where certain sounds came from would not be present, so I wasn't surprised with that deficiency. But that appears to be the only deficiency, and I'm learning how to compensate for it. And unlike my 6:1 sound system, I can hear softer sounds better.
customer_reviews.author: D. Eckman

customer_reviews.title: Good for PS3/Xbox 360 gaming! Can be used on PC as well.
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty old now but work well with PS3/Xbox 360, can be used on a PS4 or newer however you loose some functionality, and of course work fine with PC. These also have strong bass and sound good, plus the mic brings my voice across crisp and clear with no distortion. If you are going to be using PC, PS4 or Xbox one I would recommend getting something newer and saving yourself the hassle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The headset is pretty good overall, but the materials are not the best quality.
customer_reviews.text: This headset is a pretty good one overall. The mic is very good, the sound is very good, and I was pleased with it for the most part. However, the left ear snapped off recently and it's been less than a year since I ordered it. It's somewhat disappointing because my last Turtle Beach headset lasted much longer. I would recommend this headset, but be careful with it. Treat it very carefully or it may break earlier than intended.
customer_reviews.author: CoreytheCrow

customer_reviews.title: PX21, definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these with the advice from friends that I wouldn't be disappointed. They were very right. I bought them about a month ago, and since that time my TV's volume hasn't been turned up... at all. Whether I'm watching Netflix or gaming my heart out on Battlefield 3, the quality is crazy, sound is amazing, deep lows crisp highs through and through. Chat boost is awesome. When I can hear the enemy running around the corner towards me on my RIGHT side, and I know that for a fact, you get the jump. Very nice, every things awesome.
customer_reviews.author: TheTechGuy

customer_reviews.title: Good mic and headphone combo
customer_reviews.text: I used the same bluetooth for years and once it died one of my friends told me about this headset and said it was great, now that i have it i completely agree. The clarity of sound through these are great, way way easier to understand and here other ppl talking. Only thing that i wish is that i could have afforded the wireless version b/c having a cord is a pain. Other than that one con it would get a 5 star because ut is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: -First of all, this isn't a cheap headphone. It is durable. Ive had it for only a month, but i can tell from the quality that it will last at least a year. -Sound Quality: 3.5 Good Base Sound Controls are very useful A faint buzzing noise due to the usb power noise is heard easily from the outside no surround sound -Durability: 5 (so far) cables are very thick the headphone is made of good material -Comfort: 3 comfortable at first, but gets irritating after thirty mins -Value: 4 its only 65 dollars. compared to other headphones of its price, it is better.
customer_reviews.author: New Jersey Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect entry headset!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first headset, and I really didn't NEED it, but am glad I got it. Sound quality is superb and microphone works perfectly. I also liked the individual controls for volume and chat. Friends complain about the cord but it didn't bother me. Plenty long enough for it's purpose and didn't get in the way, even when the dog is walking all over it. Plus its about $25 cheaper here than local stores.
customer_reviews.author: AvgJoe

customer_reviews.title: low price great product
customer_reviews.text: Low price and product works great. The cord is long enough that it makes it from my tv all the way across the room where I sit a proximate 15 feet. This did not come with any instructions on how to plug in and make work but I though it was really easy anyway and if you have trouble there is YouTube videos out there to help.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: A headest that is a definite buy
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that I am very satisfied with this product. It delivers very clear sound and being able to hear your friends and the game clearly is very good. You can and will hear everything, you can hear someone sneaking up behind you when you wouldn't be able to without this headset. Now I am going to tell the only drawback, there is a hissing which I was able to get over in about 5 seconds. Trust me as soon as the game starts you will never notice it because it is a very minor hiss. Overall this is a good product for anyone looking to by a headset.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality. Had more than one replacement and every ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality. Had more than one replacement and every headset I owned would have the sound in the ears cut out from very basic use. I talked to a couple friends that had the same headset and apparently they also had the same problem. The mic is okay but the speakers seem to not last long
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive Upgrade to your Regular Headsets
customer_reviews.text: Really a nice upgrade to your regular headsets for PC or XBOX 360. Will work on both for the one price - extra if you need the surround sound box. However, its such a pain you probably wont use it because of the tangle of wires. Also be prepared for the cable to stop working if its stretched or run over by your office chair.
customer_reviews.author: Harold L Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset for PS3,XBOX360 and PC gamers
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through 6 different headsets in my time as a gamer, and this has been the best one by far. The sound is excellent the mic is very clear and you can adjust almost every bit of audio you hear just from the headset. Although it is great there are a few small thing i would like to point out. At the point where the speaker attaches to the headset there is a weak point, be VERY careful about that. Also, the wires could be a bit longer, i find myself a little close to the screen at times. Overall amazing item, go ahead and buy it now.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Pros: great sound and control. long cord comfort + Cons: none yet ... they feel solid but the swivel looks like a likely spot to break ... just from all the other reviews. Other thoughts: The way I see it, I paid about as much as a new game which would be old in about a year if not sooner. so if they last that long I'll be happy ... will update if the break.
customer_reviews.author: Reach_Medic

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The px21s are ..Im a hardcore gamer and with these babies my game has hit another level I can hear any thing from anyone trying to creep up from behind me and try to take me out to a buzzing fly.. the mic and game audio is great I love that I can control both incoming sounds to my liking.. One problem is that after sometime the headset gets heavy on your ears and it starts bugging but other then that Im happy
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Will never go back to my tunner
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are by far the best investment I made for my PS3! I can now play the volume cranked and not bother the rest of the family! C'mon guys how many times have you had to "Turn that thing down" because the Woman was annoyed? Well these baby's solve that problem. I find myself totally involved the the game environment. You will get the feel that you are actually on the battlefield or in my case in the race car.There are others that are "5.1 Digital" I don't buy it. The price of them are double of what I paid for these. Strongly recommend these!!
customer_reviews.author: David J

customer_reviews.title: SHORT LIFE
customer_reviews.text: I PURCHASED THIS ITEM IN MARCH 2012 AND THREW IT OUT IN AUGUST 2012 BECAUSE IT WOULD NO LONGER WORK. THERE WAS NOTHING TO ADJUST NOR FIX. IT WAS JUST NOT WORKING. I FIGURE ONE OF THE WIRES CAME LOOSE OR THE PRODUCT WAS DEFECTIVE. I WAS MORE THAN DISAPOINTED. I AM CAREFUL WITH EQUIPMENT. I WOULD NOT PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT. THE EAR CUPS WERE NOT THAT COMFORTABLE AS WELL.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: TurtleBeach is really slipping. Product has issues right out ...
customer_reviews.text: TurtleBeach is really slipping. Product has issues right out of the box... but I put up with them on my PS4 so I don't have to keep my headset plugged into the controller. Having to keep wireless headset plugged into controller is backwards

customer_reviews.text: THIS HEAD SET IS WORTH EVERY DIME YOU HEAR EVERYTHING FROM FOOT STEPS TO SOME ONE CLOSE BUY RELOADING A CLIP TO THEIR GUN THE HEAD SET IS IN STEREO ALONG WITH CHAT YOU CAN MUTE TV AND HAVE THE SOUND AS LOUD AS YOU WANT IN THE HEAD SET THIS IS ALSO GREAT FOR SOME ONE THAT HAS A HARD TIME HEARING THE TV.... THIS HEAD SETT BRINGS A NEW ADVANTAGE TO GAMING AND IT IS VERY COMFORTABLE YOU WILL NEVER USE THE PS3 HEAD SET AGAIN AFTER YOU HEAR AND FEEL THEY TURTTLE BEACH HEAD SET SIMPLY PUT IT'S THE BEST THING SENCE SLICED BREAD.... I WOULD TELL EVERY ONE TO BUY THIS HEAD SET IT IS AWESOME!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: OUTLAW1199

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable; superb sound quality; great buy
customer_reviews.text: i came across this exact headset at my friends house and i decided to try them out. i have heard that turtle beach headsets are amazing and frankly, they are amazing!!! the bass boost is unprecedented and it has crystal clear sound so that you can hear the most minute sounds on multiplayer that you would have never heard before. like someone sneaking up behind you...which happens to me alot!! oh and this headset is compatible with the ps3, xbox 360, mac, and pc so it's a universal headset but not a cheap headset by no means!! i rate these 10 out of 10 for the price and the quality!! skull candy can't even compare
customer_reviews.author: Jesussaves

customer_reviews.title: The best headset I've owned so far
customer_reviews.text: The best headset I've owned so far! The mic is really great, I love how flexible it is. I've dropped it a bunch of times but it hasn't broken (yet) though if it does break, I won't think twice before buying another pair! :3 Update: It just broke after 9 months of using it every day! As soon as I get the money, I'll get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Lover of the Turtle Beach
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely happy with these headsets. I purchased two, one for myself and one for my husband. We used them to play Black Ops, and this allowed me to hear footsteps coming up on me camping! I heard a lot of trash talking because they were getting killed over and over again. Even more when they find out it's a girl! The voice clarity is great! Great price point!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gaming headset!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this for my brother for Christmas and then after trying it out went and bought it for myself! Clarity in audio plus the ability to select voice or game sounds and volumes is a huge plus. If you don't want to listen to annoying people when playing games, mute your mic and turn down the chat volume! Works on systems as well as PC!
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Never get shot from behind again.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound.! Used for gaming consoles.. If the game has a stereo sound I can hear EVERYTHING! I am able to hear people behind me to the exact location, exactly angle they are coming in from, and their distance. I hardly ever get killed from behind ...unless the other player is perked with ninja or dead silence.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: É outra Coisa
customer_reviews.text: Tenho que enumera-los:1-Som Perfeito tipo cinema. 2-audio que voce nunca havia escutado ou percebido nos Games. 3-Vantagens sobre o inimigo em jogos de guerra, pois voce escuta tudo,aproximação de alguem principalmente. 4-Preço dentro do padrão,com sorte voce ainda consegue descontos promocionais, como no meu caso.5-Aparelho não incomoda é leve e confortavel. 6-Facil conexção(PS3) e vem com todos componentes para instalação 7- Ninguem em casa vai reclamar mais do barulho/som dos seus jogos,silencioso aos outros.8-Os fios de conexção são enormes(3 metros)e isto é muito importante.9-Tem desenho moderno e funcional.10-Quer mais ou ta bom pra voce?

customer_reviews.title: Headset broken after 10 months
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed having these while I play xbox/ps/pc games. But only after 10 months of adult use and care, the right side earpiece broke from the headset frame, allowing the earpiece to just dangle freely. After careful inspection of what had broken, the plastic piece that covers the frame to the earpiece broke away from the little screws inside. Disappointed they didn't last longer. I would recommend looking in to a different headset.
customer_reviews.author: FromtheShadows

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!
customer_reviews.text: After carefully evaluating and researching "the perfect" gaming headset, I ended up selecting PS3 Ear Force PX21 Gaming Headset. These worked fine for exactly ONE YEAR!!! Now they are junk!! There is a loose connection causing me not to hear out the left earpiece. I would expect headphones to last longer - I do not suggest anyone to buy these!!!
customer_reviews.author: JandKB

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is fair but the wires to the ear pieces short easily. I wouldn't recommend this to anyone who doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: bought it in January of 2016 and it lasted 6 months. it was carefully stored when not in use and handled very delicately even when used. The sound quality is fair but the wires to the ear pieces short easily. I wouldn't recommend this to anyone who doesn't want to buy a headset every few months
customer_reviews.author: Ravenger

customer_reviews.title: PX21... where have you been my whole gaming life?
customer_reviews.text: This is the best set of headphone/communicator on the market, hands down. I play CoD MW2 online.(Playstation username slappyslug) It is the only way to play online and still communicate with your team. You do not have to shout or worry about feedback or the sound of your TV effecting other players. I play Hardcore, and this has definitely given me an advantage. You can hear everything like you were in the game itself. If you are a serious or even a casual online player, you have to get these! BUY IT!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: slappyslug

customer_reviews.title: Ear Force Brings Gaming And In Game Chat To A New Level
customer_reviews.text: The P21 Headset brings quality game sound and adjustable chat volume together very well. I tried many different types of headsets before purchasing the P21 and nothing came close to the quality of sound, especially for chat clarity. The only thing is the webbing used to cover the ear phone can sometimes be uncomfortable for extended periods of use. Now I can blast my games without bothering others in the house. All in all I give these a 5 STAR rating
customer_reviews.author: NELS428

customer_reviews.title: Was Awsome
customer_reviews.text: If your rough on your headset or drop it by accident this headset might break. I fixed mine with super glue though. After about 7-8 months of use the right side gave out. I would have to jiggle the cord at an angle to get it back until that trick stopped working. With one side dead I still used it as the left side still worked. Then the left gave out. I want to say that the quality of the sound was amazing though. My ears kinda got bugged by the cups of the pads. But a five minute break and they were good again for a few hours. Thus good quality sound weak frame.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Spear

customer_reviews.title: Clear as a Bell

Even though I don't use this headset for a gaming system, my use is for my computer where I spend hours a day on Teamspeak talking to all the gamers around the world that I play with. I also use them for streaming of music via Pandora radio. I just say awesome. For the price they have quality and comfort. I don't ever have to buy another headset.

Email sent to Turtle Beach to check on their warranty, but I don't expect them to replace the headset.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Beagle

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice economic substitute to TB's wireless headset

I do hope to upgrade to the wireless versions but I do not have the $200 the wireless cost ( i think that price is right) these have a very, very long wire that gives me no problems with distance however.

I definitely do not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa Ione

customer_reviews.title: favorite headset

The first one did break after about a year and a half the right ear piece plastic just snapped detaching it from the headset. the second one I had for about a year til my puppy decided it looked like a yummy treat. so I am hoping this third pair will last a little longer. this is probably the best headset Ive owned which is why I am purchasing a third pair. I also have a Steele Series set thats very comfortable but it has some static when plugged into my PC to where these dont.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME headset
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound, works for PS3 or xbox or PC, only had to buy 1 additional cord for xbox that wasn't included and cost me like $5. Overall, for the price especially, I am 200% satisfied. Couldn't ask for a better headset, sounds excellent! I didn't know what I was missing and what all the fuss was about until I had some of my own!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK Sound - Flimsy Construction
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present. Sound quality was fine and the controls and features worked as promised. Problem is that the headphones are fragile. A couple of weeks after purchasing they fell off my desk onto the carpet and snapped the tiny little pivot that the earpiece swivels on. Glued and taped together with one earpiece in a fixed position they survived another few months before a similar incident snapped the other side. Bottom line - they may be fine for a careful adult but in my opinion they won't survive the typical teenager.
customer_reviews.author: K Blueridge

customer_reviews.title: Great headsets but can only use one....
customer_reviews.text: We bought two headsets so we can talk to each other and to the other people online, but apparetnly you can only hear or speak through one headset so the other headset we bought was a complete waste of money. So if you have a ps3 and are considering biying two. DONT!!! Save your money and only buy one cause it doesnt work with two. Other then that its a great headset.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: which makes this headset extremely amazing for its price
customer_reviews.text: The headset is fairly decent for its price, especially if you bought DPX21's. DPX21's basically is PX21's with surround sound and a bass booster feature, which makes this headset extremely amazing for its price. Unfortunately, this headset seems to find a way for the wire to always mess up and blow out one of the speakers. About every 6 months I have to buy a new one if I want the same quality, but that's purely because I have the bass booster and surround sound for it. PX21 alone is still good quality, especially for its price, but again: it is very fragile and easily breaks if you're not super careful.
customer_reviews.author: PlayaXSlaya

customer_reviews.title: Fragile cup attachment...
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this headset is excellent, except the right side broke where the cup attaches to the headband and when tried to repair with tape, the ear cup no longer fits against the ear. Others we know who own the same headset had the same thing happen to theirs. Too expensive to be disposable after only two months use. Poor overall quality.
customer_reviews.author: gh1977

customer_reviews.title: fragile merch
customer_reviews.text: These things are exactly what people are saying but they leave out one important detail.. The headset is very fragile, mainly the wiring, if you accidentally yank it or something the wire will loosen, then youll only get sound in one ear or just the background noises without dialog.. so i would tape around the amplifier and around that wire that comes out of the left ear bud, if you dont it'll yank out within 6 months, this will be my third pair im buying in less than 2 years.. since i cant find anythinh better for this price, theyll have to do..
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset
customer_reviews.text: I use this headset on the PS3 and when I play Starcraft 2 on the PC. Works great! Others can hear me very clear and being able to lower chat or game sound on the toggle helps. The cord is long so I'm able to kick back on my bed when i play Black Ops late at night. When I don't feel like talking, I just move the mic out of way and put the chat down so I don't have to mute people all the time. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nung

customer_reviews.title: Best for PS3
customer_reviews.text: This is a great headphone for the PS3. Others have complained about noises which I have not had issue with. Yet that is. We love the headphones and they allow us to play without disturbing the whole house. The sound is great and the voice acceptable. I wish there were more options for the PS3, but for now, these definitely get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M. Chaplin

customer_reviews.title: amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: One of my coworkers at GameStop has a pair of these and told me about them, so I thought I would get a pair for myself and give it a try. I got my set in the mail yesterday and hooked them up as soon as I got home from school to try it out with Assassin's Creed Revelations, and I was STUNNED by how incredible the sound quality is. I'm hearing things in games that I could NEVER hear before, and it's amazing. For anyone who either just wants a headset to play games without disturbing anyone else in the house, or to those who are really into multiplayer and need a good headset/mic, I highly recommend the PX21s.
customer_reviews.author: S. Butterfield

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Crap, Don't Buy, They won't stand behind their product
customer_reviews.text: What if you receive a junk pair of these, and can't get any help from the company? How would you feel about spending your money, to receive trash that will not work and you can't get your money back? Find a company that stands behind their product, because this one will not. Sure, the set of headphones you receive will probably work, for awhile, but what if they don't? Or what if they conk out after two months of normal use? Will you be satisfied throwing your money away? Please try to find a similar product from someone else, because if we continue to give companies like this money, we'll have nothing but crap.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money - Peice of rubbish.
customer_reviews.text: Fails in less than 2 months - Don't buy it. Bought this on the 12th August 2013 - and by the end of September 2013, it was not working. The sound would not come through the headphones correctly, low and turning on and off, obviously some kind of fault internally. I tried to return it but the return period for the item was only until the 14th of Sept 2013 - I can see why it is such a short return window - because the product can't last very well. it was delivered promptly - so 5 stars there. Impossible to find out who to contact about a replacement or refund.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Bad customer service

After multiple back and forth emails that were leading nowhere, with generic advice, I decided to return the headset. I will never order a Turtle Beach product again.
customer_reviews.author: HonestAlways

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Headset!

customer_reviews.title: Turtle Beach PX21 Gaming Headset
customer_reviews.text: The headset's sound quality was good; even with just a stereo connection we were able to tell where gunfire was coming from. However, the PX21s don't do a good job at sound isolation. If you're using the headset next to someone, he or she will most likely be able to hear what's going on through the earcups. The PX21 can also double as a PC or Mac gaming headset. You can either use the USB dongle as a virtual sound card or use the included 1/8-inch-to-stereo-RCA adapter to attach it to your sound card. Either way, the headset performs just as well, adding to the overall value of the product.

Pros: First 6 months best headset in this price range Cons: completely broken in about 7.5 months

product_meta.title: PS3 Ear Force PX21 Gaming Headset
product_meta.description:
Size:!Only Bluetooth 2.0| Color:Black, White, Red

Universal Amplified Stereo SoundView larger COMPLETE The Ear Force PX21 integrates premium stereo game sound with crystal-clear communication on the PlayStation Network (PSN), Xbox LIVE and PC/Mac to create the definitive audio environment for playing popular game titles on all platforms. The PX21 is two headsets in one - a stereo USB headset for chat sound and an amplified stereo headset for game sound. That means you can independently control chat and game sound from a single control box whether you’re playing PS3, Xbox 360 or PC games. Large, comfortable ear cups with a lightweight, rugged design provide the ultimate in comfort during extended game play.The PX21 gives you a significant advantage because you can hear sound cues others can’t, so you’ll react faster and take them out before they take you out. Unique gaming features such as variable bass boost, Chat Boost, stereo expander and convenient volume controls for chat and game audio, provide a competitive edge that can make the difference between winning and losing. If you’re serious about your PS3, Xbox 360 or PC gaming, then get serious about the sound. Move up to the Ear Force PX21 and become a better player while experiencing your games as they were meant to be heard.

COMPATIBLE WITH
PS4, PS3, Xbox 360, PC, Mac

TURTLE BEACH AUDIO ADVANTAGE
The amplified stereo sound produced by the PX21 will ensure that you hear your games loud and clear. We put variable bass boost at your disposal to give your audio a swift kick in the you-know-what when you need it to! You’ll be able to hear sound cues that are missed with conventional TV speakers, such as the sound of enemy footsteps or the click of a loading weapon in the distance. In short, you'll react faster and take them out before they take you out, giving you the edge that can make the real difference between winning and losing.


Superior Quality and ClarityView larger AMPLIFIED STEREO
Get an earful of top quality sound the way the game developers actually meant the game to be heard.

VersatilityView larger PLAY ON ANYTHING
Go from a console player on PlayStation 3 or Xbox 360 to a PC or Mac gamer and back again quickly.

Advanced Chat TechnologyView larger DYNAMIC CHAT BOOST
Only Turtle Beach offers chat volume that automatically increases as the game volume gets louder so your teammates are never drowned out by sudden explosions.

Deep Immersive ExperienceView larger BASS BOOST
Gives your audio a kick in the you-know-what to add depth and realism to the sounds of the game.

Total Control Over SoundView larger HEAR WHAT YOU WANT, WHEN YOU WANT
With Independent Game and Chat Volume, turn the game sound up & chat volume down. Or turn the chat up and the game down! The choice is yours.

Voice Level RecognitionView larger MICROPHONE MONITOR
Know how people tend to scream when wearing headphones? Now you can hear your voice in your headset so you’re not that guy!
